problem_description:
The airport control tower at metropolitan airport needs to schedule landing times for 44 incoming aircraft on a single runway. Each aircraft has specific time constraints and penalty costs for early or late landings. The system must ensure safe separation between consecutive landings and minimize total penalty costs.

Aircraft arrival information:
1. Aircraft F001: earliest landing 0, preferred landing 0, latest landing 0, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
2. Aircraft F002: earliest landing 79, preferred landing 137, latest landing 196, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
3. Aircraft F003: earliest landing 146, preferred landing 271, latest landing 396, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
4. Aircraft F004: earliest landing 226, preferred landing 351, latest landing 476, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
5. Aircraft F005: earliest landing 306, preferred landing 431, latest landing 556, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
6. Aircraft F006: earliest landing 378, preferred landing 503, latest landing 628, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
7. Aircraft F007: earliest landing 528, preferred landing 626, latest landing 724, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
8. Aircraft F008: earliest landing 635, preferred landing 727, latest landing 820, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
9. Aircraft F009: earliest landing 770, preferred landing 895, latest landing 1020, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
10. Aircraft F010: earliest landing 842, preferred landing 967, latest landing 1092, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
11. Aircraft F011: earliest landing 1042, preferred landing 1167, latest landing 1292, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
12. Aircraft F012: earliest landing 1114, preferred landing 1239, latest landing 1364, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
13. Aircraft F013: earliest landing 1314, preferred landing 1439, latest landing 1564, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
14. Aircraft F014: earliest landing 1394, preferred landing 1519, latest landing 1644, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
15. Aircraft F015: earliest landing 1466, preferred landing 1591, latest landing 1716, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
16. Aircraft F016: earliest landing 1666, preferred landing 1791, latest landing 1916, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
17. Aircraft F017: earliest landing 1746, preferred landing 1871, latest landing 1996, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
18. Aircraft F018: earliest landing 1818, preferred landing 1943, latest landing 2068, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
19. Aircraft F019: earliest landing 2018, preferred landing 2143, latest landing 2268, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
20. Aircraft F020: earliest landing 2098, preferred landing 2223, latest landing 2348, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
21. Aircraft F021: earliest landing 2170, preferred landing 2295, latest landing 2420, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
22. Aircraft F022: earliest landing 2266, preferred landing 2391, latest landing 2516, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
23. Aircraft F023: earliest landing 2466, preferred landing 2591, latest landing 2716, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
24. Aircraft F024: earliest landing 2538, preferred landing 2663, latest landing 2788, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
25. Aircraft F025: earliest landing 2738, preferred landing 2863, latest landing 2988, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
26. Aircraft F026: earliest landing 2818, preferred landing 2943, latest landing 3068, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
27. Aircraft F027: earliest landing 2898, preferred landing 3023, latest landing 3148, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
28. Aircraft F028: earliest landing 2978, preferred landing 3103, latest landing 3228, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
29. Aircraft F029: earliest landing 3050, preferred landing 3175, latest landing 3300, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
30. Aircraft F030: earliest landing 3146, preferred landing 3271, latest landing 3396, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
31. Aircraft F031: earliest landing 3346, preferred landing 3471, latest landing 3596, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
32. Aircraft F032: earliest landing 3418, preferred landing 3543, latest landing 3668, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
33. Aircraft F033: earliest landing 3618, preferred landing 3743, latest landing 3868, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
34. Aircraft F034: earliest landing 3690, preferred landing 3815, latest landing 3940, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
35. Aircraft F035: earliest landing 3786, preferred landing 3911, latest landing 4036, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
36. Aircraft F036: earliest landing 3986, preferred landing 4111, latest landing 4236, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
37. Aircraft F037: earliest landing 4066, preferred landing 4191, latest landing 4316, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
38. Aircraft F038: earliest landing 4146, preferred landing 4271, latest landing 4396, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min
39. Aircraft F039: earliest landing 4218, preferred landing 4343, latest landing 4468, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
40. Aircraft F040: earliest landing 4314, preferred landing 4439, latest landing 4564, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
41. Aircraft F041: earliest landing 4410, preferred landing 4535, latest landing 4660, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
42. Aircraft F042: earliest landing 4506, preferred landing 4631, latest landing 4756, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
43. Aircraft F043: earliest landing 4602, preferred landing 4727, latest landing 4852, early penalty 2/min, late penalty 2/min
44. Aircraft F044: earliest landing 4802, preferred landing 4927, latest landing 5052, early penalty 1/min, late penalty 1/min

Safety separation requirements: Aircraft must maintain minimum time gaps between consecutive landings on the single runway. The required separation depends on aircraft weight categories and landing sequence. The aircraft are classified as follows:
- Heavy aircraft (22 aircraft): F001, F002, F006, F007, F008, F010, F012, F015, F018, F021, F022, F024, F029, F030, F032, F034, F035, F039, F040, F041, F042, F043
- Light aircraft (22 aircraft): F003, F004, F005, F009, F011, F013, F014, F016, F017, F019, F020, F023, F025, F026, F027, F028, F031, F033, F036, F037, F038, F044

The separation requirements are:
- Heavy aircraft followed by heavy aircraft: 96 minutes separation
- Light aircraft followed by light aircraft: 80 minutes separation
- Heavy aircraft followed by light aircraft: 200 minutes separation
- Light aircraft followed by heavy aircraft: 72 minutes separation

The control tower needs to determine the optimal landing time for each aircraft that minimizes total penalty cost while satisfying all time windows and separation requirements. Each aircraft must land within its specified time window [earliest_landing, latest_landing], and sufficient separation must be maintained between consecutive landings on the runway
solution_format_description: Print the following fields: - landing_times: landing time for each aircraft. - runways: runway assignment for each aircraft. - total_penalty: sum of early/late penalties.
